mapper.insert: insert into category(no, name, description, reg_date, blog_id) values(null, #{name }, #{description }, now(), #{blogId })
mapper.select: select c.no, c.name, c.description, c.reg_date as regDate, c.blog_id as blogId, count(p.no) as count from category c left outer join post p on p.category_no = c.no and c.blog_id=#{id } group by c.no order by count(p.no) desc
